overview:
International software executive with extensive experience growing sales and profits for U.S and European technology companies.

Previously, CEO of InfoVista, a NASDAQ listed global software provider to the Enterprise and Telecom market space, later acquired by the US private equity firm, Thoma Bravo. Prior to InfoVista, Senior Vice President and General Manager of Computer Associates (now CA Inc.) / Application and Information Management BU ($750 Million revenue with staff responsibilities of up to 1000). Joined CA from Platinum Technology where Gad served as Managing Director â€“ France, Switzerland and Africa for this $1 Billion information management enterprise software provider.

Specialties: Infrastructure Management (CA) - Information Management (Platinum) - Communication Service Providers (InfoVista), Middleware and Application Performance Management (Nastel).

Excels in multi-cultural environments with broad international business experience, fluency in four languages and dual citizenship US/EU.
